Name: Heavy Guard
Parameters: â«˜ Heavy Armor Proficiency, Shield Proficiency
Description: When wearing Heavy armor and using a shield, gain +2 Armor.

Name: Travelerâ€™s Endurance
Description: +1 Speed; ignore the first level of Fatigue.

Name: Arcane Spellcaster
Description: Gain access to Arcane Spellcasting. You learn a number of Arcane spells equal to your Scholarship, and learn 2 Arcane cantrips.

Name: Divine Spellcaster
Description: Gain access to Divine Spellcasting. You learn a number of Divine spells equal to your Scholarship, and learn 2 Divine cantrips.

Name: Cosmic Spellcaster
Description: Gain access to Cosmic Spellcasting. You learn a number of Cosmic spells equal to your Scholarship, you cannot learn spells above level 1. "Upcasting" casts spells multiple times instead.

Name: Occult Spellcaster
Description: Gain access to Occult Spellcasting. You learn a number of Occult spells equal to your Scholarship, you cannot learn spells above level 2. Spells are always upcast. You learn 2 Occult cantrips.

Name: Elemental Spellcaster
Description: Gain access to Elemental Spellcasting. You learn a number of Elemental spells equal to your Scholarship, choose one element; spells of that element deal +X damage . You learn 2 Elemental cantrips.

Name: Cantrip Adept
Description: You learn 2 additional cantrips from your chosen spellcasting type. If you have chosen cosmic, learn 1 extra spell instead.

Name: Quick Reflexes
Description: Reduce incoming damage by half your level (minimum 1).

Name: Cantrip Knowledge
Description: Convert one level 1 spell from your spellcasting type into a cantrip.

Name: Minor Channeling
Description: Cast one level 1 spell without spending Mana.

Name: Chef
Description: Cook allies a meal during a rest. Eating the meal grants them either +X+1 Accuracy or +X Armor next combat.

Name: Tavern Brawler
Description: Improvised weaponry uses the Highest proficiency tier you have; they deals +1 Damage.

Name: Miner
Description: Identify and extract minerals. Deal +X damage to constructs and stone enemies. Ignore disadvantages from non-magical darkness.

Name: Brewer
Description: During a rest, create a potion per ally from your known potions list. Learn a number of Potion Recipes equal to [Half Your Level], gain +X to Brewing Related Checks.

Name: Fisher
Description: When resting near water, regain +50% Health; You can fish while resting, guarantee treasure worth at least X gold.

Name: Storyteller
Description: Tell a tale; allies gain 1 Grace at the start of next combat and remove a mental condition. Gain +1 Scholarship.

Name: Gravedigger
Description: During a rest, burying a dead ally grants Grace equal to remaining allies next combat; burying an enemy restores Health equal to allies Ã— level.

Name: Bardic Drunk
Description: While intoxicated, gain +X Damage and -2 Accuracy.

Name: Hermit
Description: Recover +2 Health when resting alone. While no allies are within 2 units, gain +X Accuracy or +Y Armor.

Name: Street Performer
Description: Performing earns rewards worth atleast 3 gold (Narrators Discretion). Performing in combat grants allies within 5 units +2 Accuracy.

Name: Candle Keeper
Description: Light sources you hold never go out. While in its light, gain +1 Insight and +1 Reflex.

Name: Combat Trapper
Description: Using [1Ã— Common Component] you can create a trap in an adjacent unoccupied tile. The trap can activate only once, dealing X damage and applying 3 stacks of Slow to a creature that stepped on the same tile as the trap. Using [1Ã— Rope Component] you can create and throw a Bola. You are proficient with Bolas. Bolas can be thrown up to 6 tiles away doing X damage and applying 3 stacks of Slow to the creature.

Name: Conductive Wiring
Description: Using [1Ã— Metal - Wire], you can create fences up to 4 Tiles long and 1 Unit tall. Each fence deals Stuns dealing X Lightning Damage when a creature crosses it, loosing 1 durability.. The fence has 1 Durability.

Name: Survivalist
Description: Gain +X Accuracy against beasts and natural creatures. Gain advantage on Insight, Reflex, and Fortitude checks in natural environments.

Name: Tracer Shot
Description: Fire a glowing projectile, it marks the struck target; allies gain +1 Accuracy against the marked target.

Name: Non-lethal Shot
Description: You can choose to deal non-lethal damage with ranged attacks.

Name: Arcane Edge
Description: Melee spell effects have +X Accuracy

Name: Elemental Draw
Description: You make an attack that deals +X elemental damage of a chosen type.

Name: Mana Slash
Description: You can spend a number of mana equal to your level, add that amount to as Damage to your next attack. Attack counts as magical.

Name: Beast Whisperer
Description: You can tame animals or beasts to become companions (Narratorâ€™s discretion).

Name: Bonded Instinct
Description: When you command your companion to strike the same target as you. It gains +X Accuracy.

Name: Spirit Bond
Description: When your companion is healed, you recover half the Health restored. You can see through your companion within 12 tiles.

Name: Noble Steed
Description: While riding your companion, gain +2 Armor. First damage taken each combat grants Guard equal to companionâ€™s Speed.

Name: Carapace
Description: While unarmored, gain +X Armor.

Name: Forgotten History
Description: Gain +X Scholarship when identifying or examining historical objects.

Name: Weakpoint
Description: Landing an attack grants +X Accuracy against that target until combat ends.

Name: Ancient Study
Parameters: â˜… Unbound â«˜ Occult Apprentice / Cosmic Novice
Description: Occult and Cosmic spells/cantrips gain +1 Range. Learn 1 Occult cantrip and 1 Cosmic spell, bypassing type restrictions.

Name: Cowardâ€™s Instinct
Description: Gain +2 tiles of movement while moving away from enemies or feared.

Name: Master of Disguise
Description: Gain +1 Deception and Finesse while disguised or attempting to blend into a crowd.

Name: Leg Day
Description: Double movement until next turn; movement is halved the following turn.

Name: Focused Strike
Description: The first melee hit you make each scene gains +X Damage.

Name: Hard Swing / Big Bonk
Description: Add +2 Damage to a melee attack.

Name: Focused Mind
Description: +1 to resist Charm, Fear, and Illusion effects.

Name: Spell Scribe
Description: Identifying a used spell grants +1 Spellcraft against that enemy, stacking up to 3 times.

Name: Ritualistâ€™s Patience
Description: Ritual spells take half the time and grant +X Arcana on that spell.

Name: Pocket Sand
Description: As a reaction, blind an enemy entering your melee range until their next turn.

Name: Remote Activation
Description: Activate an allied mechanical device, trap, or gadget within 6 tiles as a free action.

Name: Reinforced Construction
Description: Crafts and modifications you create gain +2 Durability.

Name: Craftsman
Description: You gain the ability to Craft; You start with Trivial Recipes, at each point of Tinkering above 1, increases the known recipe tier. Learn a number of Recipes equal to [Half your Level]

Name: Gearwright
Description: Repair one trivial or simple craft during a rest without a check. (Requires 1 relevant component)

Name: Field Mechanic
Description: Repair a craft to full operation. Each craft can only benefit from this once.

Name: Scrap Salvager
Description: Perform a Tinkering check to disassemble objects into components, crafts that you made grant 2, else grant 1.

Name: Arc Current
Description: Constructs/Machines you have deployed can expend one unit of Durability (Fuel) to shock targets within 2 units, dealing 2 Lightning Damage. This counts as an attack by the machine.

Name: Charged Conduit
Description: When casting a spell through a spellcasting craft, add +X Damage.

Name: Spell Interface
Description: Once per rest, imbue a spell into a machine or construct, the spell lasts for a day, and will trigger based on a declared condition. (Complexity determines spell level, Trivial = Cantrips, Simple = level 1 etc.)

Name: Relentless Advance
Description: Moving into melee range of an enemy grants +X Accuracy for your next attack.

Name: Locksmith
Description: Open simple locks without tools; gain +X Finesse.

Name: Companion Recall
Description: If your companion is within 10 units, and is injured. You may teleport them to yourself and heal them by [half Your Level] Health

Name: Pathmaker
Description: Dash into a target within 3 units, dealing 1 Force damage. Damage applies only to enemies.

Name: Crippling Impact
Description: The target you dash to gains 3 stacks of Slow until your next turn and takes +1 Force damage.

Name: Crushing Impact
Description: The target you dash to takes +1 Force damage. If below half Health, they instead take +2 Force damage.

Name: Displacing Impact
Description: The target you dash into is pushed 3 units away in the direction of the dash and takes +1 Force damage.

Name: Switching Impact
Description: The target you dash to is swapped with your original position. If the target is an ally, they gain Guard equal to your level.

Name: Guarding Impact
Description: If you dash onto an ally, they gain Guard equal to your level; otherwise, you gain the Guard.

Name: Mana Charger
Description: You can charge devices or machines that require electrical power using Mana.

Name: Mechanical Assistant
Description:
Using [1Ã— Metal - Wire, 1Ã— Metal - Plate], construct a small mechanical assistant. It counts as a companion with the following stat block:

| Health/Durability [Your Level]
| Armor [6+Your Tinkering]
| PHY 0 | TEC 1 | MYS 2
| Traits:
- Assist: This companion assist you while crafting, smithing, brewing or casting a ritual. It grants you +2 to the relevant rolls.

Name: Spell Drone
Description:
Using [1Ã— Metal - Wire, 1Ã— Wooden - Core], create a flying spell drone that stays within 3 units of you. It counts as a companion with the following stat block:

| Health/Durability [Your Level]
| Armor [6+Your Tinkering]
| PHY 0 | TEC 1 | MYS 2
| Traits:
- Conduit (1 Durability): You cast a spell from this companions position.

Name: Combat Rover
Description:
Using [1Ã— Metal - Wire, 1Ã— Stone - Cut], create a small combat rover, It counts as a companion with the following stat block:

| Health/Durability [Your Level]
| Armor [6+Your Tinkering]
| PHY 2 | TEC 1 | MYS 0
| Traits:
- Melee Strike: Strike a target within Melee range with [Your Tinkering] Accuracy; It deals [1+ Your Tinkering] Force Damage.

Name: Dual Wielding
Description: You can wield two Light weapons. Off-hand attacks use all applicable modifiers.

Name: Dual Action
Description: Your companion makes a free attack against a target you attacked.

Name: Second Strike
Description: After attacking with a melee weapon, make another attack without expending an action.

Name: Guardianâ€™s Oath
Description: When an adjacent ally is attacked, take X damage to reduce that attackâ€™s damage by Y.

Name: Mana Reservoir
Description: Gain a reservoir of 3 bonus Mana for level 1 spells. Can be used on level 2 spells starting at level 6.

Name: Unyielding Defense
Description: When at or below half Health, gain +X Armor.

Name: Precision Form
Description: When your attack modifiers exceed half (rounded up) of the enemyâ€™s Armor, gain +X Damage.

Name: Tactical Awareness
Description: Gain +X Accuracy against enemies adjacent to your allies.

Name: Enduring Spirit
Description: When below half Health, gain Guard equal to half your level + X.

Name: Steady Aim
Description: For each scene you do not take damage, gain +1 Accuracy, stacking infinitely. Resets when you get hit.

Name: Channel Focus
Description: Casting a spell grants Guard equal to half your level. This refreshes but does not stack.

Name: Duelist Technique
Description: While wielding a single one-handed weapon, gain +X Armor and +X Reflex.

Name: Crushing Blow
Description: Your next melee attack deals +X Damage and you suffer -Y movement this turn.

Name: Executionerâ€™s Edge
Description: Deal +2 Damage to enemies at half Health or lower.

Name: Resolute Will
Description: Ignore the first negative condition each rest. Gain +1 Fortitude.

Name: Perfectionist Strike
Description: On a hit, deal bonus Damage equal to the half the amount your attack exceeded the targetâ€™s Armor. On a miss, take Damage equal to half the amount missed by.

Name: Focus Breaker
Description: Damaging a Spellcaster causes them to lose 1 Mana (doubled on Midnights).

Name: Adaptive Guard
Parameters: â«˜ Medium Armor Proficiency / Heavy Armor Proficiency
Description: If an enemy attacks you twice in one combat, gain +X Armor against that enemy for the rest of combat.

Name: Blood pact
Description: Spend up to your level in Health to deal half that amount (rounded up, minimum 1) as bonus Damage.

Name: Blacksmith
Description: Repair gear during rest. Restored gear gains +1 Damage or +1 Armor and 3 Durability before expiring. Gain +X Tinkering

Name: Treasure Hunter
Description: Gain +2 Finesse for looting. Exploring new areas grants +X Speed

Name: Cartographer
Description: Gain advantage on Insight checks when recalling known locations. When resting in a previously visited area, you cannot be ambushed.

Name: Restorative Meditation
Description: During rest recover X Mana.

Name: Focused Conduit
Description: Your first spell each combat costs no Mana and gains +2 Range.

Name: Mana Conservation
Description: When a spell is countered, regain its Mana cost plus 1.

Name: Mana Flow
Description: Slaying an enemy with a spell refunds its Mana cost.(Triggers once per spell)

Name: Spell Specialization
Description: Choose one known spell; it gains +2 Damage, Range, and Healing. Reduce known/prepared spells by 1. You may change out the chosen spell when you level up.

Name: Aimed Shot
Description: Gain +2 Accuracy and +1 Damage (+1 Accuracy at levels 6 and 12).

Name: Quick Reload
Description: Reloading a firearm no longer costs an action.

Name: Tracking Expertise
Description: Identify tracks and movement signs. Gain +X Insight against hidden or fleeing enemies.

Name: Piercing Shot
Description: Fire through up to two targets in a line. The first target takes +2 Damage. You only need to hit the first target.

Name: Sudden Camouflage
Description: Hitting an enemy causes attacks against you to suffer -X Accuracy.

Name: Explosive Ammunition
Description: Make a Ranged attack that explodes in a 1-tile radius, dealing 1 Damage.

Name: Elemental Coating
Description: Modify one reload of ammunition to deal +X Elemental Damage of a chosen type.

Name: Bounding Retreat
Description: After a ranged attack, move 3 tiles without provoking oppertunity attacks.

Name: Crippling Shot
Description: Make a ranged attack that reduces target movement by 3 tiles for X turns.

Name: Runic Impact
Description: When you hit with a melee attack, expend 1 Mana to trigger a level 1 spell at the hitâ€™s location.

Name: Runic Shot
Description: When you hit with a ranged attack, expend 1 Mana to trigger a level 1 spell at the hitâ€™s location.

Name: Ranged Conduit
Description: You may cast cantrips through ranged attacks. On activation, you may instead cast a level 1 spell for free.

Name: Spirit Conduit
Description: You may cast spells from your companionâ€™s position.

Name: Arcane Link
Description: Your companion gains a Mana pool of 4. You may spend its Mana while it is within 6 units of you.

Name: Unseen Strike
Description: The first melee attack each combat is an automatic hit if performed from behind or above (no Midnights).

Name: Quick Cast
Description: Cast one spell as a Free Action instead of an Action. (Does not bypass attack limit per turn.)

Name: Spontaneous Insight
Description: Once per combat, reroll a die on any skill check. You gain only 1 Grace regardless of outcome.

Name: Duelistâ€™s Prowess
Description: While wielding a single one-handed weapon, your critical success range expands [âš„âš„,âš„âš…,âš…âš…]. Misses do not consume charges.

Name: Battlefield Awareness
Description: When an enemy moves adjacent, you may react to move 2 tiles without provoking oppertunity attacks. Enemies within 10 tiles suffer stealth penalties equal to your Insight.

Name: Vanishing Act
Description: When you take damage you may use your reaction to immediately perform an attack with halved Damage (Rounded up) and you move up to 2 tiles. This does not trigger an opportunity attack.

Name: Parry
Description: When hit by a melee (or ranged at level 6) attack, contest the roll with Athletics. On success, ignore the damage.

Name: Braced Stance
Description: You count as one size larger for grappling checks.

Name: Jury-Rig
Description: Restore a broken craft to 1 Durability for a scene. While active, it gains +2 Damage when applicable.

Name: Lucky Fella
Description: You gain +2 On all Gambling / Luck related checks.

Name: Carrying Mule
Description: You gain +5 Maximum Encumberance

Name: Pocket Aces
Description: You gain advantage on all Gambling / Luck related checks.

Name: Compelling Invite
Description: All adjacent enemies become Taunted

Name: Field Medic
Description: Allies resting with you gain double healing, you can remove 1 Condition per ally once per combat.

Name: Constructive Trapper
Description: [2Ã— Common Component]: Create a trapped 2x2 area, it can trap multiple creatures, it will only trigger when a declared condition is met. Trapped creatures take X damage and have their movement reduced by 3.

Name: Deployment Trapper
Description: Traps you can deploy can be deployed within a range of 5 units.

Name: Guerila Trapper
Description:
You can deploy 2 normal traps, or 1 Large trap during a rest.
Normal traps: Combat Trapper traps.
Large traps: Constructive Trapper traps

Name: Explosive Trapper
Description:
Traps you deploy, when triggered, deal +1 Damage in a 1 unit radius.

Large traps explosions count as a 4x4 square.

Name: Binding Trapper
Description: Traps you deploy now knock enemies Prone, they must roll [Reflex] vs [6 + Tinkering] to resist.

Name: Combat Guard
Description: Taunting enemies grants 1 Guard per enemy taunted. Doubled for enemies larger than you.

Name: Recovery
Description: Each scene you have guard, recover X Health

Name: Back to back we stand
Description:
Choose an Ally or Companion, this choice can only be changed uppon leveling up.

While they are within 1 unit of you, gain +1 Accuracy and +1 Armor. Each 1 point of damage they take can be reduced if you take 2 points of damage instead. You gain +2 movement speed towards them.

Name: Suppresive fire
Description: Unleash a 4 Unit cone of projectiles. Creatures within it must use seek the nearest cover as a reaction, if they do not find any, or do not have a reaction, they take 2 Damage.

Name: Breserk
Description: You gain the ability to enter a Rage state. In this state you loose 6 Armor, and gain +X Damage and +Y Accuracy. This state lasts until dismissed, unconcious or end of combat.

Name: Natural Defences
Description: While in Rage, you gain Resistances to Blunt, Slash, Pierce and Cleave damage.

Name: Bodyslam
Description: You slam your body against a target within melee range. You loose all of your guard, and deal that much damage to the target.

Name: Great Weapon Mastery
Description: Heavy Weapons deal +X Damage, but suffer -3 Accuracy

Name: Blood Vigor
Description: When you defeat an enemy, recover X Health

Name: Momentum Drive
Description: Consecutive hits against the same target grant you +1 Damage, stacking up to +4, Missing or Switching targets resets the Stack.

Name: Counter Stance
Description: When Taunted targets strike you, they take X Damage. The Damage type matches your weapons type.

Name: Spellbreaker
Description: When a spell is cast within 3 units, you may dispell it. You can only do this before rolls are made.

Name: Ethereal Step
Description:
Move up to 5 units, you ignore terrain penalties, you may pass through 1 obstacle in your way. During movement you may refresh this ability to pass through multiple obstacles, however your movement does not refresh.

Obstacles must not be larger than 1 unit, relative to the direction you are moving through them.

Name: Healing Pulse
Description: Heal all allies within 3 units for X Health.

Name: Mystical Overload
Description: Double the damage of your next spell, take damage equal to the Mana cost of the spell.

Name: Spell Echo
Description: Repeat the last spell cast for free. If no spell was cast, cast a spell for free.

Name: Minor Syphoned Healing
Description: When you cast a healing or support spell, you or one ally regain X Health

Name: Cursed Cycle
Description: When one of your controlled or cursed targets is defeated, move the curse to a new target and refresh its duration.

Name: Camperâ€™s Discipline
Description: If you did not move this turn, your next ranged attack gains +X Damage and +Y Accuracy.

Name: Arc Shot
Description: When targeting creatures behind partial cover, gain +2 Accuracy

Name: Tough
Description: Gain +2 Max Health per level.

Name: Skilled
Description: Gain 2 Skill points.

Name: Mana Sap
Description: Mana you drain from Spellcasters replenishes your Mana.

Name: Symbotic Flow
Description: When you cast a spell, your companionâ€™s next attack deals +X Damage; when it attacks, your next spell deals +Y Damage

Name: Pheonix Recovery
Description: Upon reaching 0 Health, recover 6 Health and immediately take another turn.

Name: Arcane Detonation
Description: Release All Mana; deal 2 Force damage per Mana spent to enemies within 2 tiles; you gain 2 Fatigue.

Name: Last stand
Description: While at or below half Health, gain +2 Damage and +1 Armor.

Name: Cantrip Overflow
Description: While at full Mana, your cantrips deal +X Damage.

Name: Elemental Reflection
Description: Spells against you matching your chosen element, suffer a -X Accuracy penalty.

Name: Eternal Discipline
Description: 2 Active trait uses restore automatically after each combat.

Name: Eternal Guardian
Parameters: â«˜ Back to Back we stand
Description: When your chosen Ally/Companion falls to 0 Health, they remain at 1 Health and gain +2 Armor until the end of their next turn.

Name: Arcane Sniper
Description: Arcane spells gain +4 Range.

Name: Major Syphoned Healing
Description: When you cast a healing spell, extend its effect to one ally or you at full strength.

Name: Cosmic Protection
Description: Each cast of a Cosmic spell grants +1 Guard.

Name: Occult Dominion
Description: Occult Curses/Brands/Marks gain +1 Target.

Name: Master Channeler
Description: Spell Mana restores fully on a rest; you also recover 2 Mana after each combat.

Name: Darkness Rise
Description:
After landing 3 Attacks you begin to emit a 1 unit radius Zone of Death.

Zone of Death: Counts as Rough terrain. Each scene, or when entering the zone, Enemies take X Dark Damage. If the zone has not damaged a target for 2 Scenes, it dissapates.

Name: Second Shot
Description: After attacking with a ranged weapon, make another attack without expending an action.

Name: Dead Horizon
Description: Make one ranged attack with +X Damage, piercing all enemies in a 6 tile line. If any enemy dies to this, regain the traits use. Targets must roll [Reflex] vs the attack roll.

Name: Eldritch Convergence
Description: When you attack a target affected by yours or an allies spell/curse, that attack gains +X Dark Damage.

Name: Enduring Rage
Description: When you enter Rage, gain Guard equal to [Your Level + 2].

Name: Workers companion
Description: Companions each grant +1 Tinkering when brewing, crafting, smithing, medicine, spellcrafting or ritual casting.

Name: Longshot
Description: Ranged weapons and traits, gain +X range

Name: Enticipation
Description: You cannot attack this round, gain X Guard until your next attack.

Name: Against the odds
Description: If enemies outnumber allies within a 5Ã—5 radius, gain Armor equal to the difference. Enemies at least 2 sizes larger than you count as two.

Name: Thick skin
Description: After combat, recover half of your missing hp.

Name: Twoification
Description: Allies within 2 tiles gain +2 speed and +2 range for 2 turns.

Name: Sunblessed
Description: Gain +1 Armor while in direct sunlight, loose 1 Armor when in darkness.

Name: Giant Slayer
Description: While targeting a creature thats at least 1 size larger than you, you gain +1 Damage and +1 Accuracy.

Name: Climber
Description: You gain advantage on climbing checks, while not moving and on a wall, you cannot be knocked off.

Name: Carpenter
Description: You can convert between wooden components freely. When creating crafts mostly consisting of wooded components, you gain advantage.

Name: Combat Carpenter
Description:
You can use wooden crafting components as weapons; Combine any number of components to create an improvised melee or ranged weapon that deals Force damage equal to the number of components used; ranged weapons have a 6 tile range. It has Durability equal to the number of components used.

Throw an ikea furniture set at them.

Name: Drama Queen
Description: You attempt to convince creatures targeting you that you are dead. You are knocked prone; affected creatures must roll [Insight] vs [6 + your Deception] to resist; Creatures you have already tricked will gain +3 to the roll.

Name: Seamstress
Description: Using one piece of clothing, you transform it into another piece of clothing or a copy of non-magical equipment you already own.

Name: Makeup maid
Description: Outside of combat, you may disguise yourself or allies. Creatures attempting to see through the disguise must roll [Insight] vs [6 + your Performance.]

Name: Shumpo
Description: In combat, rolling a midnight no longer doubles damage; instead, you gain one additional action this turn, which may be used to attack.

Name: Fair Strike
Description: The chosen targetâ€™s next attack loses all modifiers and deals only base weapon damage.

Name: Fair Fight
Description: You create a 3Ã—3 zone you must occupy on cast. Spells cannot be cast within it, and spells from outside cannot target creatures inside. The zone lasts 3 Scenes, or ends immediately if you or the caster leaves the zone.

Name: Commanding Presance
Description: You command a creature within 6 units to lay down its arms, it will not act for 2 scenes, or until damaged. It must roll [Insight] vs [6+ Intimidation] to resist.

Name: All warmed up
Description: In combat, once you have spent all of your mana for the first time, all of your non-cantrip spells deal +2 damage.

Name: Jewler
Description: During a rest, you can restore a found object and increase its perceived market value. The increase is +X.

Name: Fearsome Sight
Description: Gain advantage on intimidation checks.

Name: Crimson Convergence
Description: Healing beyond your max HP is converted into Guard, up to a maximum of 2 + (X Ã— your level).

Name: Convenience Fee
Description: When a creature within 6 units is healed by their ally, you may reduce that healing by (your level + X) and heal yourself for the amount reduced.

Name: Redoubled Valor
Description: While you have no known spells; When you are given a buff by an ally, you may choose to double its duration or effect.

Name: Ghost
Description: You cannot be targeted by ANY creature until you make your next attack or the start of your next turn, whichever comes first.

Name: Rush
Description: If you havenâ€™t acted this scene, swap initiative with a target; on your next turn, you may take only one action.

Name: High Guard
Description: When Obstructing aim, you count as half cover.

Name: Stone Skin
Description: Casting Eearth spells, or using Earth elemental effects, grants 2 Guard, stacking.

Name: Guardian
Description: Grant an ally 5 Guard, it disapates the first time they or you attack.

Name: Deaths Respite
Description: Give yourself or an ally, with the highest current health (Guard included), immunity to death for 1 scene. If they were to drop bellow 1 Health, they remain at 1 Health

Name: Make it rain
Description: You fire 3 shots into the sky, these will land and hit 3 random targets within 8 units. They deal 1 Damage, and prioritize Enemies.

Name: Thought out plan
Description: As long as you have not acted this turn, you may skip it. Next turn you have 3 Actions.

Name: Combat Wingman
Description: Allies have advantage against enemies Taunted by you.

Name: Wingman
Parameters: â«˜ Back to back we stand
Description: Your chosen ally/companion gains Advantage on Charm checks.

Name: Mystic Sacrifice
Description: Sacrifice 4 Health to Receive 2 Mana

Name: Unshakeable
Description: You gain [6 + Your Level + Your Fortitude] Guard, you cannot Move, Be Moved or Attack while this guard is active. (Can be removed with any Cleanse Effects.)

Name: Transfusion
Description: Deal 3 Damage to yourself, heal a creature other than yourself, by 6 Health.

Name: Death Lotus
Description: Deal [Half Your Level] damage in a 1 tile radius around you. Taunted enemies take damage an additional time.

Name: Ruthless Predator
Description: Your Oppertunity attacks deal +2 Damage.

Name: Dummies
Description: You may spend this reaction at any point. You move to an unocupied space within 3 units, you leave a Target Dummy with 3 Health where you were standing. Any attacks targeting you are redirected to the dummy.

Name: Twin Disciplines
Description: You gain either +2 Armor or +2 Accuracy until your next turn.

Name: Mark of Death
Description: Transfer any and all negative conditions to a target within 9 tiles. You don't need to see the target, just know of their pressence.

Name: Convenience Tax
Description: Drain 3 mana from an ally within 6 units, add it to yourself.

Name: Guaranteed Yield
Description: Any Damage or Guard gain with a base value lower than X is increased to X.

Name: Morning Light
Description: You treat the next Action of a chosen ally, or yourself, as if it were the first action they have taken this combat.

Name: Piruette
Description: Deal 1 Damage to all Adjacent creatures. If this is the first action in combat, it deals damage twice.

Name: Inhibit
Description: Remove all weapon proficiencies of a target until your next turn.

Name: Overexertion
Description: You may activate traits, while you have no uses left. Doing so grants 1 point of fatigue per activation.

Name: Vigor
Description: Spend all of your grace, granting yourself that amount of Guard.

Name: Measured Restraint
Description: You loose access to a spell until your next sleep. You replenish Double its Mana cost as Mana.

Name: Veiled Blessing
Description: You can no longer be Healed or gain Guard from allies. Gain +X Armor.

Name: Time Crunch
Description: Starting after your turn ends, and lasting for 4 Scenes; Everyones turn consists of only 1 Action.

Name: One of each
Description: You gain +2 Damage on ALL attacks. You cannot use the same attack multiple times per combat. Lasts until your next rest.

Name: Toss Me
Description: You can throw a grappled creature at least 1 size smaller than you. They are treated as a ranged weapon you are proficient with, and have a max range of [3+ Your Might Total]. If the thrown creature is an ally, they may make an attack on landing; otherwise, they deal damage equal to [your Might total].

Name: Loaded Dice
Description: Make an attack that deals bonus damage equal to your Grace, then reset your Grace. Grace cannot increase Accuracy for this attack.

Name: Riposte
Description: If you took Guard damage without your Guard being fully depleted, make an attack against the creature that struck you.

Name: Risky Strike
Description: Make a X Damage Melee or Ranged strike with your weapon, if the target dies you gain X Gold

Name: Rite of Dominance
Description: You lose 4 Health; The next 3 attacks in a 2 tile radius have their damage reduced by 2.

Name: Rite of Negation
Description: When a spell is cast within 8 units, you may counter it; doing so causes you to lose access to a spell you know of your choice until your next rest.

Name: Rite of Calling
Description: You lose 4 armor, 3 enemies within 8 units have -3 Accuracy until the end of combat.

Name: Sharing is caring
Description: When an ally within 8 units casts a spell, you may pay for it with your mana instead.

Name: Catalyst of Aeons
Description: You can repair Durability of Crafts or Companions using Mana or Health; Each point of Durability is equal to 4 Mana or, 2 Health.

Name: Intimidating Roar
Description: You stun all enemies with their Current Health below [Your Level] within a 3 tile radius.

Name: Take a moment
Description: When you reload a firearm, you recover [Half Your Level] Health

Name: Survival Skills
Description: At the start of each Scene you gain Guard equal to the number of times you were hit last Scene.

Name: One for All
Description: Any guard you gain is evenly divided among you and your allies.

Name: All for One
Description: Half of any guard gained by your allies is instead given to you.

Name: Arenas Favourite
Description: For the next 2 Scenes you lose 4 Armor and gain +4 Accuracy

Name: Crimson Banquet
Description: All mana costs are reduced by 1. You lose 2 Health, each time you cast a spell.

Name: Crimson Pact
Description: Spells cost no mana, instead pay [Double the Spell level] as Health. Crimson Banquet no longer has an effect.

Name: Light Footed
Description: If you have traveled at least 8 tiles; You gain +3 Reflex and +1 Armor. For 2 Scenes

Name: Sojourners
Description: Whenever you receive a Buff from an ally you can apply a copy of the Buff to another ally.

Name: Slam Dunk
Description: If you climb a wall or jump over an obstacle, you can jump at an enemy and attack with your weaponm, doing +X Damage. An ally can also offer a boost to perform this attack.

Name: Return
Description: Return an object you threw within 6 tile to your hand.

Name: Losers Fallacy
Description: Single-target Trait Attacks deal bonus damage equal to the granting traitâ€™s point cost. This effect stacks.

Name: Cold blooded
Description: While resting you must rest near a heat source. You consume half the amount of rations.

Name: Syphoning Whirlpool
Description: You deal 1 Damage to all Adjacent Enemies; You regain Mana equal to the Damage dealt.

Name: Deep Pockets
Description: Spend 2 mana to create one Crafting Component; if unused the Component dissapears on your next rest.

Name: Even Deeper Pockets
Description: When summoning a component; You may pay +2 Mana, and instead gain one Trivial Craft. It will dissapear next rest.

Name: Guillotine
Description: You deal +3 Damage to Prone Enemies

Name: Behold the Infinite
Description: Gain X bonus Spells from your Spellcasting School; These spells can only be cast if you Pay for them using Grace.

Name: Bodybuilder
Description: You gain +1 to Might and Intimidation Checks

Name: Battle Ready
Description: During the first Scene of combat, all of your Spells cost 2 Less Mana

Name: Leg Sweep
Description: Perform a non-Damaging melee attack; If the attack hits the target is knocked prone.

Name: Evasive Stance
Description: Gain bonus Armor equal to the amount of Speed over 5.

Name: Snipers Nest
Description: While Prone you have Advantage on Non-Spell Ranged Attacks.

Name: Personal Vendetta
Description: You Taunt a target up to 6 units away. If your weapons range exceeds this amount, use that range instead.

Name: Bloodlust
Description: While in Rage; You ignore Attack per turn restrictions, however you cannot take any actions that does not deal damage. You loose the ability to dismiss your Rage.

Name: Returned Investment
Description: For every turn you do not cast a spell, you reduce the cost of the next spell cast.

Name: Bypassed
Description: You learn 1 cantrip not from your Spellcasting School.

Name: Blindfold Training
Description: The blind condition no longer imposes Disadvantage/Advantage. Instead it becomes a -2/+2 Respectively.

Name: Steadfast
Description: Reduce all Incoming Damage by 1.

Name: Bookies Choice
Description: Lose Access to Cantrips, gaining Maximum Mana equal to the number of cantrips lost. Future cantrips are also converted.

Name: Strike the Hand
Description: You make an attack with your Melee Weapon, attempting to disarm an enemy. They must roll [Fortitude] vs [6 + Your Might] to resist.

Name: High Road
Description: Gain 3 Grace at the Start of combat, if you had spared a life last combat.

Name: Self Defence
Description: Gain +2 Accuracy against creatures Taunted by you.

Name: Lead and Follow
Description: When an Ally preforms a Trait granted attack action, you may do the same Action against the same target, if you also have that Trait.

Name: Shield Vault
Description: The target you dash to becomes Stunned if you have a shield equipped.

Name: Sharesies
Description: Throw your ally a weapon, if you are proficient with it, they also become proficient with it, until the end of combat.

Name: Patient
Description: You start Combat with 1 Mantra Stack, Your Mantra Stacks cannot drop bellow 1. All healing you receive is given to you as Stacks of Mantra instead.

Name: Reckless
Description: While in Rage; Your Armor becomes 0, All Melee Damage you deal is doubled.

Name: Disagreeable Aegis
Description: When you are struck by a projectile and you have guard; Reflect the projectile towards the person that attacked you, treat it as a ranged attack originating from you.

Name: Mana Blast
Description: This trait does not gain uses on a rest. Each time you cast a level 2 Spell you gain 1 use. Make a Ranged attack that uses [Spellcraft] as its bonus, dealing 3 damage to a creature within 6 units.

Name: Hostage
Description: While grappling a creature you are considered to be behind partial cover.

Name: No Restraints
Description: Deal Double Damage to Guard.

Name: Treaded Ground
Description: While traveling on tiles an Ally has already walked on this Scene, you gain +3 Movement Speed.

Name: Gracious
Description: You start combat with Grace equal to [Half your Level]

Name: Inspirational
Description: You can no longer generate Grace, nor can you use it grant bonuses to rolls; You may use 1 Grace point to grant yourself or an ally Advantage.

Name: Artilery Mage
Description: Your Spells no longer cost Mana; You only have 1 Action per turn.

Name: Lead Role
Description: Gain +1 Charm; When you spend grace on an attack roll it deals bonus Damage equal to [Charm]

Name: Comfy Sleeper
Description: You gain the full benefits of sleep even if you sleep 6 hours or less.

Name: Gardener
Description: Gain Advantage on checks needed to care for plants.

Name: Merchant
Description: You sell items for 10% more gold, and buy items for 10% less gold (Narators Discretion).

Name: Sizeable Slash
Description: You preform a large Slash with your Melee weapon, it deals +1 Damage in a 2 Tile Cone.

Name: Answered Prayer
Description: During your rest you may preform a 30 minute ritual; doing so grants you X Grace after the Rest concludes.

Name: Musician
Description: You can play your chosen instrument and are proficient with it as an improvised weapon. While playing, allies within hearing range gain either +1 Armor or +2 Accuracy.

Name: Sailor
Description: You are proficient with maps and compasses. Gain advantage on Scholarship checks regarding ports or islands. You can determine North while viewing any type of sky. You are proficient with driving Water vehicles.

Name: Sharp Nose
Description: Gain advantage on checks involving smell (e.g. detecting poison).

Name: Hard Target
Description: Cover grants one higher tier of protection. While in cover, gain +2 Accuracy. You may move between covers (min. 3 units apart) as a Free Action.

Name: Combat Artisan
Description: You gain Access to Combat Crafts; You know a number of Combat Crafts equal to [Half Your Level], the maximum tier of craft depends on the tier unlocked by Craftsman.

Name: Master Thrower
Description: Any throwable item you use deals +X Damage.

Name: Mind
Description: You may spend X Grace to recharge X Mana.

Name: Range
Description: You may spend X Grace to increase the Range of ranged attacks or spells by X.

Name: Dexterity
Description: You may spend X Grace to gain X Speed Stacks.

Name: Haste
Description: Spend 6 Grace to gain 1 Haste Stack.

Name: Scroll of a Madman
Description: Gain +3 Scholarship. You permanently gain Madness Conditions.

Name: Soul Slash
Description: Dash up to 3 tiles. Enemies you pass through take 2 Damage. You heal for the total Damage dealt; excess healing is converted into Guard.

Name: Unstoppable Force
Description: Cleanse all negative effects and Conditions. Until the end of any turn in which you did not perform a melee attack, you cannot gain negative effects or Conditions.
